il.ac.hit.taxitogo.model.taxicar

Interface ITaxiCarDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLTaxiCarDAO

    public interface ITaxiCarDAO

    An Interface class for taxi car DAO purpose.

    Version:
    22.01.2015
    Author:
    Victor Zhinzherov, Lior Kizer, Ariel Yusupov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTaxiCar(TaxiCar taxiCar)
      This method is used to add new taxi car into the database.
      boolean deleteTaxiCar(int taxiNumberPlate)
      This method is used to delete an existing taxi car from the database.
      java.util.Collection<TaxiCar> getFiveClosestTaxiCars(double latitude, double longitude)
      This method is used to get five closest taxi cars list from the database by latitude and longitude coordinates.
      TaxiCar getTaxiCar(int taxiNumberPlate)
      This method is used to get a specific taxi car from the database.
      java.util.Collection<TaxiCar> getTaxiCars()
      This method is used to get taxi cars list from the database.

      This method is used to update an existing taxi car info in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • addTaxiCar

        void addTaxiCar(TaxiCar taxiCar)
         throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to add new taxi car into the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiCar - TaxiCar - Taxi car object
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • getTaxiCar

        TaxiCar getTaxiCar(int taxiNumberPlate)
            throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to get a specific taxi car from the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiNumberPlate - int - Taxi car plate number
        Returns:
        TaxiCar - Taxi car object
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • getTaxiCars

        java.util.Collection<TaxiCar> getTaxiCars()
                                   throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to get taxi cars list from the database.

        Returns:
        Collection - Taxi cars list
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • getFiveClosestTaxiCars

        java.util.Collection<TaxiCar> getFiveClosestTaxiCars(double latitude,
                                                     double longitude)
                                              throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to get five closest taxi cars list from the database by latitude and longitude coordinates.

        Parameters:
        latitude - double - Taxi car latitude coordinate
        longitude - double - Taxi car longitude coordinate
        Returns:
        Collection - Five closest taxi cars list
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • deleteTaxiCar

        boolean deleteTaxiCar(int taxiNumberPlate)
               throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to delete an existing taxi car from the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiNumberPlate - int - Taxi car plate number
        Returns:
        boolean - True if taxi car was deleted. False if taxi car wasn't deleted.
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • updateTaxiCar

        void updateTaxiCar(TaxiCar taxiCarToUpdate)
            throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to update an existing taxi car info in the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiCarToUpdate - TaxiCar - Taxi car object
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database
